p: The area under the curve (AUC) of the receiver operating characteristic (ROC) which was created by MaxEnt, was used to estimate the performance of the model [ 49]. AUC values range from 0 to 1, where a value of <0.5 can be interpreted as a random prediction. An AUC value between 0.5 and 0.7 indicates poor model performance, 0.7–0.9 indicates moderate performance, and >0.9 indicates high performance [ 50– 51].
